alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pittsburg County through 800 PM CDT... At 716 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Kiowa to 3 miles northwest of Blanco. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Kiowa... Savanna... Ashland... Blanco... Pittsburg... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
